# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This repository uses unified agent instructions. All AI agent guidance is maintained in a single source of truth file.

## Reference

Please reference and follow all instructions in: [AGENTS.md](../../AGENTS.md)

## Platform-Specific Notes

GitHub Copilot workspace references work via Markdown links. The above link provides full access to the unified agent instructions at the repository root.

The relative path `../../AGENTS.md` navigates from `.github/copilot-instructions.md` to the repository root where `AGENTS.md` is located.
